overview:
Natalie Diggins directs technical operations at Zoove, deploying integrated systems for StarStar Number’s rapid cross-carrier, cross-device growth in the United Sates. With over 15 years of industry experience, Natalie brings a wealth of knowledge in production engineering, network operations, network deployment, technical support and service activation, internationally and in multiple languages.

Prior to joining Zoove, Natalie cofounded and was VP of Operations for New Edge Networks (acquired by EarthLink), a nationwide telecommunications backbone network provider, helping raise more than $500M in debt and equity. She served as VP of Global Operations for mBlox, the world’s largest mobile transaction network, running worldwide operations. And she was VP for GST Data Services (acquired by Time Warner Telecom), a pioneering telecommunications company, where she was responsible for all facets of the data product lines.

Natalie was also the President of the Central Coast Software and Technology Association, the VP of the Board of Directors of Mission Learning Center, and the Finance Chair of the Women’s Community Clinic. Natalie is an armchair archeologist, is a San Francisco Ballet season ticket holder and loves all things bacon.
